Bug Busters

üèÜ Judges Choice Award 1st Place - Project Goal(s): 1) Find target audience for new HackHPC website 2) Include informative content about a hackathon, how you register, past, current, and future events, who the staff are, what the rules are, and how you contact us. 3) Improve navigation by including a search bar, headers & footers 4) Link information from both websites 5) Update aesthetics by adding images from most recent events, creating a thematically consistent UI, and organizing content Target Portal: http://hackhpc.org
